pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṃ paṇītānaṃ bhattānaṃ bhattapaṭipāṭi adhiṭṭhitā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.3: Atha kho aññatarassa daliddassa kammakārassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.4: “na kho idaṃ orakaṃ bhavissati yathayime manussā sakkaccaṃ bhattaṃ karonti; yannūnāhampi bhattaṃ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.5: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro yena kirapatiko tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.9: Sopi kho kirapatiko saddho hoti pasanno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.10: Atha kho so kirapatiko tassa daliddassa kammakārassa abbhātirekaṃ vetanaṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.11: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.13: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so daliddo kammakāro bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.14: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.17: Bahū me badarā paṭiyattā badaramissena peyyā paripūrissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.19: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.21: “daliddena kira kammakārena svātanāya buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho nimantito, badaramissena peyyā paripūrissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.25: Te daliddassa kammakārassa pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ abhihariṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.26: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.28: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassa daliddassa kammakārassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.29: upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.30: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro bhattagge bhikkhū parivisati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.33: “Mā kho tumhe, bhante, ‘ayaṃ daliddo kammakāro’ti thokaṃ thokaṃ paṭiggaṇhittha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.36: “Na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, etaṃkāraṇā thokaṃ thokaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.37: Api ca, mayaṃ kālasseva piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjimhā; tena mayaṃ thokaṃ thokaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.38: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.39: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā mayā nimantitā aññatra bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.41: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassa daliddassa kammakārassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.44: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.45: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjantī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.48: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.49: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.50: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.52: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.2: Aññataro bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.8: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.10: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.14: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā cīvaradānasamaye sacīvarabhattaṃ paṭiyādetvā bhikkhū nimantenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.7: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.11: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.12: Tena kho pana samayena manussā cīvarakārake bhikkhū bhattena nimantenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.16: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.20: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āyasmatā ānandena pacchāsamaṇena yena aññataraṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:4.3: Atha kho te manussā bhagavato ca āyasmato ca ānandassa bhojanaṃ adaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:4.8: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—“
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.1.2: pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, etaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.1.6: na sakkoti ekāsane nisinno yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.1.9: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañca māsā. “Cīvaradānasamayo”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.2.1: Paramparabhojane paramparabhojanasaññī, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.2.2: Paramparabhojane vematiko, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.2.3: Paramparabhojane naparamparabhojanasaññī, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.3.6: sakalena gāmena nimantito tasmiṃ gāme yattha katthaci bhuñjati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.3.7: sakalena pūgena nimantito tasmiṃ pūge yattha katthaci bhuñjati,
